author: NetworkChuck
description:
Learn more about self-driving networks: https://juniper.net/provenAI
See AIOps in the data center with Juniper’s interactive demo: https://juniper.net/chucklovesdatacenters

AI is in everything…and I’m tired of it. Every networking product seems to be slapping on “AI” just to ride the hype train. I mean, is it actually helping us? In this video, I go on a mission to find out if AI is really making networking better, or if it’s just another victim of AI Slop.


🔥🔥Join the NetworkChuck Academy!: https://ntck.co/NCAcademy

title: Stop putting AI in EVERYTHING!!
